  • Exports

This module implements placements.

Imports

common, fqdn, ../private/macros, ../private/results2, ../private/tables

Types

Dir {.pure.} = enum
  Up = "^", Right = ">", Down = "v", Left = "<"
Rotor-puyo's direction seen from the pivot-puyo. 
OptPlacement = Opt[Placement]
Placement {.pure.} = enum
  Up0 = "1N", Up1 = "2N", Up2 = "3N", Up3 = "4N", Up4 = "5N", Up5 = "6N",
  Right0 = "12", Right1 = "23", Right2 = "34", Right3 = "45", Right4 = "56",
  Down0 = "1S", Down1 = "2S", Down2 = "3S", Down3 = "4S", Down4 = "5S",
  Down5 = "6S", Left1 = "21", Left2 = "32", Left3 = "43", Left4 = "54",
  Left5 = "65"
The location where a pair is put.

Consts

DoublePlacements = {Placement.Up0..Placement.Right4}
NonePlacement = (oResultPrivate: false, vResultPrivate: Placement.Up0)
